entry.title: How to add SwiftFormat to your Xcode project

link.title: How to add SwiftFormat to your Xcode project

entry.summary: Why automatic code formatting? Many programmers have a preferred style for formatting their code, and others seem entirely blind to the existing formatting conventions of a project (to the enragement of their colleagues). When collaborating on a project, it can be helpful to agree on a common coding style, but enforcing that manually is tedious and error-prone, and can lead to arguments if...
